00030         void TreeOverlayDebug::onTree(PagingLandScapeOctree& n) const 
00031                 {    
00032                         SimpleRenderable * const s = n.getRectangle2d(mScnMrg);
00033             if (n.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->viewFrustumVisible)
00034             {
00035                             if (n.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->queryVisible) 
00036                 {
00037                     s->setMaterial ("BaseWhiteNoLightNoDepthCheck");
00038                     occlusion.mCurrentRenderQueue->addRenderable (s, s->getRenderQueueGroup ());
00039 
00040                     traverseChildren (n);
00041                             }
00042                             else 
00043                 {
00044                     s->setMaterial ("BaseRedNoLightNoDepthCheck");
00045                     occlusion.mCurrentRenderQueue->addRenderable (s, s->getRenderQueueGroup ());
00046                             }
00047                     }
00048                     else 
00049                         {
00050                 s->setMaterial ("BaseGreenNoLightNoDepthCheck");
00051                 occlusion.mCurrentRenderQueue->addRenderable (s, s->getRenderQueueGroup ());
00052                     }       
00053         }

00061                 {
